comment.author: 24231207@N07
comment._content: Field Marshal Sir Arthur Arnold Barrett GCB GCSI KCVO ADC (3 June 1857 – 20 October 1926) was a British officer of the Indian Army. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arthur_Barrett_(Indian_Army_officer)

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for your research Cynthia Weslow. We'll add some of this information to the record the next time we update.
